title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, May 23, 2022
description: Poet Jane Kenyon would be 75 on this day had she not died of leukemia in 1995. We hear her poem “Philosophy in Warm Weather.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Poet Jane Kenyon would be 75 on this day had she not died of leukemia in 1995. We hear her poem “Philosophy in Warm Weather.”
